title: Aura
content:
Hi! Long time since this: [http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/10709.html?1055775049](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012105823/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/10709.html?1055775049) Since my first font i have build lots of "pseudo" typefaces, read and saw lots of typohile threads. This is a new font i'm building, that I want to use for a new brand. (Custom type). I've just spend a few hours in Freehand and Fontlab, so this is a "work in progress". I wish to create a light version, and a bold. (i'm affraid of the italic). I'm sad because i've printed some 9/12pt samples, and this isn't readable. Help me! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012105823im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) I would like to hear your comments. Thanks a lot. ![aura im 01](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012105823im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/27283.gif) ![aura im 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012105823im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/27284.gif)
